name: Data Integrity
description: Measures taken to ensure the integrity of data used in training and inference.

values.name: Formally Verified
values.description: Data integrity formally verified using techniques like blockchain or Merkle trees.

values.name: Strong Checks
values.description: Strong integrity checks and tamper detection mechanisms in place.

values.name: Basic Checks
values.description: Basic integrity checks used, but no tamper-proof mechanisms.

values.name: None
values.description: No data integrity checks, data can be easily modified without detection.
